text: niyata vaśayenma firavn bhūmiyehi itāmat uṅan̆gū vī ehi siṭi aya vividha koṭas valaṭa khedā ovungen ek koṭasak khelahīna kirīma piṇisa, ovungē pirimi daruvanva ghātanaya kara, gæhænu daruvanva (paṇa piṭin) jīvat vīmaṭa iḍa harimin siṭiyēya. ættenma ohu imahat aparādhakārayeku vaśayenma siṭiyēya
